movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
comments: This movie is a masterpiece!
One of the best films ever made.
I cry every time I watch the ending.
Morgan Freeman's narration is incredible.
I can't believe this didn't win more Oscars.

movies.title: Inception
comments: Mind-bending plot, love it!
Christopher Nolan is a genius director.
The spinning top ending blew my mind.
Hans Zimmer's soundtrack is amazing.
I need to watch it again to fully understand.

movies.title: The Godfather
comments: Marlon Brando's performance is iconic.
I can quote every line from this movie.
The cinematography is stunning.
The horse head scene is unforgettable.
Classic, timeless, and a true masterpiece.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
comments: Quentin Tarantino's best work!
The dialogue is so sharp and memorable.
I love the nonlinear narrative.
Samuel L. Jackson is a legend.
The soundtrack is killer!

movies.title: The Dark Knight
comments: Heath Ledger's Joker is legendary.
Christopher Nolan redefined superhero movies.
The interrogation scene is intense.
Christian Bale is the best Batman.
I can watch this over and over again.
